jaws.

The food burglar had struck again, swallowing

1463.text: But the snatched food soon came back up.

Two days later, Tucker started vomiting again.

1483.text:

1490.text:
Not only the value of the ring, but just the
emotional ties.

1493.text:
>>Rose Heaphy:
Matykowski's veterinarian says the popsicle

1496.text: stick may have dislodged the ring inside Tucker.
